page.title: 14AN 8 YEAR-OLD'S DAY
page.content: On a typical day I get up out of my bed. I go downstairs, and have my breakfast which is cereal with milk. I go into the bathroom and have a wash. I clean my teeth with a toothbrush and toothpaste. I get dressed in my school uniform. I get to school at 8.45. I play a game of tig with my friends. Tig is a running game where you chase someone and try to tig them by touching them. The whistle goes at 9.00. First I do mental arithmetic, then we have assembly. I do hand- writing and maths before playtime, and have a story before lunch. After this I do more work, finishing with a story after last playtime. When I get home I do my homework if I have any. I like tea time because my whole family sit down together to eat. Sometimes I help with the washing up. At 8.30pm I go to bed.
